mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.teacher_no AS teacherNo, t.tname, t.password, t.role, t.department_id AS departmentId, d.name AS departmentName FROM studentms.teacher t LEFT JOIN studentms.department d ON t.department_id = d.id WHERE t.id = #{tid}
SELECT * FROM studentms.teacher WHERE tname = #{tname} AND role = 'dean' LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM studentms.teacher WHERE department_id = #{departmentId} AND role = 'dean' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE studentms.teacher SET teacher_no = #{teacher.teacherNo}, tname = #{teacher.tname}, password = #{teacher.password}, role = #{teacher.role}, department_id = #{teacher.departmentId} WHERE id = #{teacher.id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentms.teacher (teacher_no, tname, password, role, department_id) VALUES (#{teacher.teacherNo}, #{teacher.tname}, #{teacher.password}, #{teacher.role}, #{teacher.departmentId})
